document_data.name: ''Halakashara''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Halakashara''''' was a [[magic]]al, ''+2 [[broadsword]]'' that originated from the [[elven]] city of [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Description: ''Halakashara'' was a finely crafted blade with the image of the sun on its pommel.
document_data.Powers: The blade of this sword was particularly damaging to the [[undead]], becoming a temporary ''+3 [[broadsword]]'', and could outright destroy them upon upon contact.
document_data.History: The broadsword once belonged to a long-forgotten warrior in Myth Drannor. It was eventually found by Prince [[Lamruil Moonflower]] during one of his excursions into the ruins.
